title: Maximum error using Lagrange Error Bound

content.question: The function f has derivatives of all orders for all real numbers, and f(4) (x)=esinx . If the third-degree Taylor polynomial for f about x=0 is used to approximate f on the interval [0,1] , what is the Lagrange error bound for the maximum error bound for the maximum error on the interval [0,1] ?

skill.text: Skill 1.F: Explain how an approximated value relates to the actual value.
